scripts.copy:html: mkdir dist && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -R src/pages dist/pages
scripts.css:watch: npm run build:dev-sass && npm run build:dev-sass -- -w
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run copy:html && npm run build:sass && npm run copy:cname && npm run copy:images
scripts.deploy: git subtree split --prefix dist -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
